attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the Olympic Committee to consider Muse to be the major performer at the 2012 Olympic Games in London.  Muse are sometimes overlooked but would be the perfect opening act.  They have the experience, music, stage presence and grandiose to be able to blow the world away.  The perfect home grown talent!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
